blogPost.title: The large intestine contains so many microbes that they probably outnumber the cells in the human body https://t.co/uDyH0lh25N
blogPost.author: The Economist

localize.full_text: 大肠中含有大量的微生物，它们的数量可能超过人体内的细胞https://t.co/uDyH0lh25N。
大腸中含有大量的微生物，它們的數量可能超過人體內的細胞https://t.co/uDyH0lh25N。

previous.title: A trial in Hong Kong of the democracy movement’s old guard is a sign that Beijing wants to crush the crusade at its roots, @suelinwong tells “The Intelligence” https://t.co/cUjVgUfc0I

localize.full_text: @suelinwong告诉 "情报局 "https://t.co/cUjVgUfc0I，香港对民主运动老兵的审判，是北京要从根本上粉碎讨伐的信号。
@suelinwong告訴 "情報局 "https://t.co/cUjVgUfc0I，香港對民主運動老兵的審判，是北京要從根本上粉碎討伐的信號。

next.title: Have women been better leaders during the pandemic? “There are so fewer [women]...in charge of those issues, the fact that many of them have been successful is also an indication that they’re pretty damn good,” says @Lagarde on “The Economist Asks” podcast https://t.co/3g3rbXs7LK https://t.co/Zl1DUfWVdx

localize.full_text: 女性在大流行期间是否有更好的领导力？"[女性]......负责这些问题的人太少了，事实上，她们中的很多人都获得了成功，这也说明她们非常该死的优秀。"@拉加德在 "经济学家问 "播客https://t.co/3g3rbXs7LK https://t.co/Zl1DUfWVdx。
女性在大流行期間是否有更好的領導力？"[女性]......負責這些問題的人太少了，事實上，她們中的很多人都獲得了成功，這也說明她們非常該死的優秀。"@拉加德在 "經濟學家問 "播客https://t.co/3g3rbXs7LK https://t.co/Zl1DUfWVdx。
